issue.title: [R] Use tempfile instead of working directory for dataset test
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-17934](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-17934). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
After ARROW-15260 I get the folder `tests/testthat/another_dataset` leftover after running `devtools::test()`. Maybe we should use a tempfile for this instead just in case the write to the working directory gets picked up by CRAN?
